email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I’m quoting a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you consider coming down to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owners, we can offer $48.50 per metric ton, which I believe is competitive for this route. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.50 sounds reasonable, but we’d like to push for $47.00 if possible. Also, can we extend the laycan to 15-22 October to allow for some flexibility? Appreciate your efforts. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve managed to secure a rate of $47.25 per metric ton, which is the best I can do at this time. The laycan can be adjusted to 15-22 October as requested. Let me know if we can proceed with these terms. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.25 works for us. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. Please send over the charter party for review. Thanks for your help! Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ll prepare the charter party and send it over by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah.
